divs: Sighting DetailsAt 2AM, I was trying to make contact with a spacecraft. I went to a zen state of mind, and be ONE with the universe. A very bright yellow star appeared in the sky.... and moved east to west... west to east. At 4h30AM the star was still in the sky and then disappeared. I felt peacefull, happy and I believed that together we can move a better world....
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Montreal
